definition: many schools of thought/many people or households
surname Bai
hundred/numerous/all kinds of

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 傢伙|家伙[jia1 huo5]
a hundred schools of thought contend (idiom); refers to the classical philosophic schools of the Warring States period 475-221 BC
The Book of Family Names, anonymous Song dynasty reading primer listing 438 surnames
the Hundred Schools of Thought, the various schools of thought and their exponents during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (770-220 BC)
baccarat (loanword)
a hundred flowers bloom, a hundred schools of thought contend (idiom); refers to the classical philosophic schools of the Warring States period 475-221 BC, but adopted for Mao's campaign of 1956
pinyin: bai3 hua1 qi2 fang4 , bai3 jia1 zheng1 ming2

definition: Dismiss the hundred schools, revere only the Confucian (idiom)/sole dominant ideology
pinyin: ba4 chu4 bai3 jia1 , du2 zun1 ru2 shu4

sentences.english: It has multiple regions that include dozens if not hundreds of branches.
sentences.chinese: 它遍及多个区域，每个区域包括几十甚至上百家支行。

sentences.english: 21They went to Capernaum, and when the Sabbath came, Jesus went into the synagogue and began to teach.
sentences.chinese: 到了迦百家，耶稣就在安息日进了会堂教训人。

sentences.english: In the sophisticated game of Baccarat it's you against the House.
sentences.chinese: 在复杂的游戏百家乐这是你的家。

sentences.english: The Eastern Zhou period is also designated as a period of a hundred schools.
sentences.chinese: 东周时期也被指定为一个时期的百家争鸣。

sentences.english: Nearly 100 law firms are being referred to the Solicitors' Disciplinary Tribunal.
sentences.chinese: 近百家律师事务所被送上律师纪律法庭。

sentences.english: Nearly one hundred technical directors from poultry enterprises attended the event.
sentences.chinese: 来自全国近百家家禽企业的技术总监参加了该活动。

sentences.english: Draw the wind and hold the various schools of thinkers' head, there are one's own unique artistic styles.
sentences.chinese: 画风容百家之长，并有自己独特的艺术风格。

sentences.english: Within the first two years of the program, more than five hundred rural pharmacies went out of business.
sentences.chinese: 实行计划的头两年里，超过五百家乡村药店关了张。

sentences.english: Hundreds of enterprises and institutions from the province and beyond came to choose suitable people.
sentences.chinese: 省内外数百家企事业单位前来招贤纳士。

sentences.english: It's a highly creative period, and now is the time for ideas.
sentences.chinese: 现在正是百家争鸣，百花齐放的时期。

sentences.english: If he picks one the game is as a traditional baccarat game.
sentences.chinese: 如果他挑选一个游戏是作为传统百家乐游戏。

sentences.english: Companies in Hebei Province to establish a modern enterprise system, one of the pilot units.
sentences.chinese: 公司是河北省百家建立现代企业制度试点单位之一。

sentences.english: Hallam, which TV channel do you want to watch?
sentences.chinese: 我在看中央电视台的百家讲坛。
我在看中央电视台的百家讲坛。
